t: Who makes Kobalt power tools for Lowe's? - The Silicon Underground
s: September 2, 2023 - As a house brand, they are less ... big name brands. But are Kobalt power tools good? And who makes Kobalt power tools for Lowe’s? I did some digging to find out. Kobalt power tools like drills and saws are made by Chervon, one of the 10 largest OEMs of power tools in the world. Kobalt outdoor tools like lawnmowers and chainsaws are made by Globe Tools Group. Chervon makes Kobalt power tools for Lowe’s. But since 2017, Lowe’s has buried Kobalt, promoting Craftsman more ...
